text:
Ref. No.: 1069/Acad./2025
Date : 23.12.2025
NOTICE
Minor Degree Course Selection
B.Tech. Third Year & Final Year students who are enrolled in Minor degree program have to register
for courses in the EVEN Semester 2025-26. Minor degree courses should be chosen from the department
in which the student enrolled. List of Minor degree courses offered by departments are attached herewith.
Students are requested to submit the choice of minor degree course (s) from respective offering department
through google form latest by 05-01-2026.
Google form Link Form QR Code
https://forms.gle/4pLSP9feozgvy7tE6
(Nand Kishore)
Assistant Dean, Academic Affairs
List of Minor Courses offered by the Departments

(ii) Artificial Intelligence (NMCS308) (4- Credit)

(ii) Digital Signal Processing (NMET308)
(4- Credit)

(3-Credit)

(NMCH 204) (4-Credit)
